General.Name: Fox-Wizel Ltd
General.Description: Fox-Wizel Ltd. engages in the fashion and lifestyle business worldwide. The company design, purchasing, marketing, and distribution of clothing, fashion accessories, underwear, footwear, fashion and sports accessories, home fashion, and baby and children's products. It sells its products through approximately retail stores, wholesalers, and franchises under the FOX, NIKE, MANGO, FOOT LOCKER, AMERICAN EAGLE, AERIE, TERMINAL X, OFFLINE BY AERIE, BILLA BONG, QUIKSILVER, YANGA, SACK'S, DREAM SPORT, JUMBO, SUNGLASS HUT, RUBY BAY, BOARDRIDERS, FOX HOMES, SHILAV, LALINE, THE CHILDREN'S PLACE, FLYING TIGER, DISNEY, and MINENE brands. The company was formerly known as Wizel Textile Marketing Ltd. and changed its name to Fox-Wizel Ltd. in February 2002. Fox-Wizel Ltd. was founded in 1942 and is based in Airport City, Israel.
